name: Adrenaline Series - Coca Cola
description: Adrenaline (2021) is a video series of fingerprints on energy drinks. The fingerprints have been carefully extracted and then reapplied to a 3d-object, revealing a ghost image of the can made visible through the sweaty palms that once touched it. As an object designed to deliver only a single caffeine kick before being disposed of, the lifespan of an energy drink aluminium can is as brief as it is intense.
